name: MX URL UPLODER BOT
description: A Advance Powerful MX Player Url Downloader and Upload to Telegram.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

OWNER_ID.description: Your telegram id, not username. Open https://t.me/MissRose_bot and send /id to bot

AS_DOC.description: True: will upload as document | False: will upload as video

DEFAULT_THUMBNAIL.description: Default Thumbnail if bot can't find streamtape video thumbnail
